cmds.cmd: http --json POST :80/piservice/join/ Content-type:application/json Accept:application/json host="First RPi Station" pi_type="B+" station_type=1
cmds.tooltip: Sent by a Station to the MS when it is ready to come online
Sent by the BRATA to the MS to authenticate and get a reg_code
